CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 声称；宣称；断言；主张；索赔；索要；要求；认领；获得；提出（权利、要求）；（因工作、努力等）应得；（因质量、重要性等）应受到注意
要求；索赔；索款；主张；权利；所有权；断言；宣称；声称；（尤指对财产、土地等要求拥有的）所有权

synonym.mean: 要求；声称；索赔；断言；值得

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 原告；[贸易] 索赔人；提出要求者

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指恳切地或再三地请求或要求，常含低三下四意味，也多用于应酬场合。
书面用词，着重指迫切、焦急或痛苦地恳求或哀求，常含较强的感情色彩。
正式用词，指非常正式，有礼貌的请求或恳求，多含担心因种种原因对方不能答应的意味。
语气庄重，指热情、诚恳和敬祈的要求，现不很常用。
强调根据事业、需要或纪律、法律等而提出的要求。
指有权或宣称有权得到而公开提出的要求。
泛指一般“恳求或哀求”，含企图说服对方或用热烈的请求软化反对意见的意味。
最普通用词，指向对方提出要求或请求，长、晚辈，上下级之间都可使用。
一般指理直气壮地提出强烈要求，或坚持不让对方拒绝的要求。
多指无真凭实据，不提供证据的断言或宣称。
多指在法庭作证，庄严地宣称自己所说属实。
侧重在作出断言时表现出的坚定与不可动摇的态度。
与assert近义，但前者指坚决维护某种主张或观点。
主观意味强，指自认为某事就是如此，而不管事实如何。
可与assert换用，但语气弱一些，侧重指行为自己的权利提出要求他人承认。

word_group.brief_definition: 做出主张, 要求着, 主张
与众不同之处, 值得注意之处, 成名的原因
提出所有权要求；声称具有技能
剩余索取；剩余索取权；追索剩余
行李标签；行李票；行李寄存卡

bilingual.source: Some people claim that unknown beings from space moved the statues.
bilingual.target: 有些人声称是来自太空的不明生物移动了这些雕像。

bilingual.source: They claim to have finished the project.
bilingual.target: 他们声称已经完成了项目。

bilingual.source: Many people claim to be a descendant of royalty.
bilingual.target: 许多人声称自己是皇室的后代。

bilingual.source: The claim that he can lift a car is preposterous.
bilingual.target: 声称他能举起一辆车是荒谬的。

bilingual.source: Some people claim to remember their preexistence.
bilingual.target: 有些人声称能记得他们的前世。

bilingual.source: Activists claim that the new policy is just whitewashing.
bilingual.target: 活动家声称新政策只是粉饰。

bilingual.source: Some people claim to have seen aliens in the desert.
bilingual.target: 有些人声称在沙漠中见过外星人。

bilingual.source: Many people claim to have seen Nessie in Loch Ness.
bilingual.target: 许多人声称在尼斯湖见过尼斯湖水怪。

bilingual.source: Detox diets claim to help the body eliminate toxins.
bilingual.target: 排毒饮食声称可以帮助身体排除毒素。

bilingual.source: Some skincare products claim to boost elastin production.
bilingual.target: 一些护肤品声称可以促进弹性蛋白的生成。

list.abstract: Claim（[kleɪm]），英语单词，作动词用，为自称；声称；断言。作名词用，为主张；断言；要求。短语搭配有claim to（向声称；主张；索赔至），例句为“Her claim has been completely disregarded.（她的要求被完全忽视了）”。 Claim及物动词类近义词有exact、say、lack等，名词类近义词有requirement、do、assurance等，相关反义词有disclaim、forfeit。Claim名词为claimant。

yingyinNormal.en: And did you claim that Mr. Ashbaugh was in love with you? Mrs. Florrick?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你当时有没有声称阿什宝先生爱上你了？福瑞克夫人？

yingyinNormal.en: And you also claim that I then acquired this office by pushing out that very same man.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还声称是我阴谋赶走了他坐上了总统之位。

yingyinNormal.en: You claim you were with Mr. Sweeney the entire time? No, not the entire time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你声称一直都跟斯威尼先生在一起？不，不是一直在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: I understand. You dispute Newton's claim that he invented calculus and you want to put Gottfried Leibniz on the top.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我明白，你是因为牛顿声称是他发明了微积分而抵触他，你想要把莱布尼茨挂在树顶。

yingyinNormal.en: In the written report, you all claim you didn't even know about the fire until after it happened. But that isn't true, is it? Well? It's not true.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在报告里，你们都声称事后才知道起火了。但这不是事实，对吗？说啊？这不是事实。

yingyinNormal.en: While I would love to claim that this campaign and the result of it are a result of my incredible speech-writing skills, I know that it is not. It is because the ground is fertile.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我虽然很想声称这项行动及其成果是我惊世骇俗的演讲技巧所致，可我知道事实并非如此，这一切都是因为天时地利。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《艾玛·沃特森达沃斯世界经济论坛HeForShe演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: Blackhand comes to claim the honor of killing you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 黑手要过来杀掉你，从而获得荣耀。

yingyinNormal.en: That's easy, baggage claim. Wrong. Now you're single.
yingyinNormal.zh: 简单，领行李的地方。错了，所以你是单身。

yingyinNormal.en: That's a big fat claim. And I'm gonna try to back it up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一个很大的题目，我会试着证明。

yingyinNormal.en: Bob Dylan again, Your Honor? It's a good claim, Mrs. Florrick. Actually, it's an excellent claim, but unfortunately I can't consider a visa application.
yingyinNormal.zh: 又是鲍勃·迪伦吗？法官阁下。这是个很好的诉求，福瑞克夫人，实际上非常好，但很可惜，我不能考虑签证申请。

yingyinNormal.en: If he finds me before midnight when the masks come off, he can claim his prize.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果在半夜大家把面具摘下来之前他找到我了，他就能得到一点小奖励。

yingyinNormal.en: The claim was for a diamond necklace his son, Caledon, bought his fiancee, you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他掉了一条钻石项链，是他儿子买给未婚妻，你的。

yingyinNormal.en: There are very few people out there who can claim to have out-Bonded James Bond.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这世上没几个人可以说自己比詹姆斯·邦德更厉害。

yingyinNormal.en: I did claim that. And did you suggest that you could use his love to manipulate him?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的确那么说过。那你有没有说过会利用他对你的爱慕，来操纵他呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Now, give me the names. They claim they're the IRA, but I don't know who they really are.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，告诉我他们的名字。他们自称是IRA，但我不知道他们的真实身份。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't claim that. President Walker does. Oh, yes. A man made bitter by his own mistakes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 指控你的不是我，是沃克总统。是啊，那个自尝苦果心怀怨愤的男人。

yingyinNormal.en: And the only way it can survive and thrive is for each of you to claim your rightful place.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而它之所以能生存并发展，依靠你们每一个人各司其职。

yingyinNormal.en: Martha is my former boss and an old friend. We speak frequently. Why she would claim that I...
yingyinNormal.zh: 玛莎是我的前任上司和老友，我们经常通话，她为什么要说我……

yingyinNormal.en: The treatments available to the village would be vastly superior to anything we can lay claim to now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 届时村民们能得到的治疗，会比我们现在能提供的先进很多。

yingyinNormal.en: They're all in town for TechWeek. We get them to sign on to an amicus brief in support of your claim.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们全都在这参加技术周活动，我们让他们签一份非当事人声明，来支持你的诉讼请求。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 声称; 断言; 主张
认领; 索取; 要求

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 请求人；认领人；索赔人

word_family.mean: v. 自称；声称；断言；要求；索取；认领；声称已获得；索赔；需要；值得

sense_info_list.en: state or assert that something is the case, typically without providing evidence or proof
sense_info_list.zh: 声称; 断言; 主张

examination_example.sentence: "Those first few days should be spent looking for work, not looking to sign on," he <highlight>claimed</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “最初的几天应该用来找工作，而不是用来签约，”他声称。

examination_example.sentence: Every Justice rightly rejected this remarkable <highlight>claim</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每位法官都理所当然地拒绝了这一非凡的主张。

examination_example.sentence: It takes collective scrutiny and acceptance to transform a discovery <highlight>claim</highlight> into a mature discovery.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将一个发现声明转变为一个成熟的发现需要集体的审查和接受。

sense_info_list.en: a right that sb believes they have to sth, especially property, land, etc.

examination_example.sentence: Similar to newly staked mining <highlight>claims</highlight>, they are full of potential.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 类似于新宣布的采矿权，它们充满着潜在的可能性。

examination_example.sentence: Unlike with mining <highlight>claims</highlight>, the community takes control of what happens next.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与采矿权不同，社区控制了接下来发生的事情。

sense_info_list.en: assert right to; assert that one has gained or achieved something
sense_info_list.zh: 认领; 索取; 要求

examination_example.sentence: Another urge or need is so intrinsic that we are barely ever conscious of its abiding <highlight>claims</highlight> on us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一种愿望或需求是如此与生俱来，以至于我们几乎从未意识到它长久以来的诉求。

sense_info_list.en: to gain, win or achieve sth
a request for a sum of money that you believe you have a right to, especially from a company, the government, etc.

word_usage.usage:
表达“宣布、宣称”
declare指公开而郑重地宣布某事，通常用于正式场合。
announce通常用于正式宣布消息、决定、计划等。
claim指声称拥有某物、某事属实、对某事负责，用于发表个人意见, 索赔等。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 表示“要求(得到)”、“请求(给予)”，根据法律、产权或其他理由，强调有权利或宣称有权利得到所要求的东西。
表示“要求”、“需要”，强调因某人有权限、权力或需要而坚持要求获得某种东西或做某种事情。
表示“要求得到”、“需要得到”、“索要”，正式用语。比ask正式一些，比demand客气一些。
指根据权利要求所需要的东西。语气比demand弱。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 宣称所有权; 要求; 认领

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: state or assert that something is the case, typically without providing evidence or proof

examination_example.sentence: They argued that her causal-sounding <highlight>claims</highlight> rested on correlational data, and that she had not adequately accounted for other potential causal factors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们认为，她的因果关系主张基于相关数据，并且她没有充分说明其他潜在的因果关系的原因。

examination_example.sentence: This is a contentious theory and such <highlight>claims</highlight> have been treated skeptically by some scholars based on their reading of the relevant data.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个富有争议的理论，一些学者基于对相关数据的阅读而对此类主张产生了怀疑。

examination_example.sentence: She associated it with abundant Thanksgiving meals that she <highlight>claimed</highlight> had "a deep moral influence."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她将其与丰富的感恩节大餐联系在一起，她声称这对感恩节有“深远的道德影响”。

sense_info_list.en: a statement that something is true or is a fact, although other people might not believe it

examination_example.sentence: Central to hereditarian science is a tall <highlight>claim</highlight>: that identifiable variations in genetic sequences can predict an individual's aptness to learn, reason and solve problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 遗传科学的核心是一个大胆的主张：基因序列中可识别的变异可以预测一个人学习、推理和解决问题的能力。

examination_example.sentence: It feels morally questionable, yet <highlight>claims</highlight> of genetic selection by intelligence are making headlines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这在道德上令人怀疑，但智力决定基因选择的说法却成了头条新闻。

examination_example.sentence: What do hereditarians need to do to make their <highlight>claims</highlight> convincing?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 遗传学家需要做些什么来使他们的主张令人信服？

sense_info_list.en: assert that one has gained or achieved something
assert right to; assert that one has gained or achieved something
sense_info_list.zh: 宣称所有权; 要求; 认领

sense_info_list.en:
make a demand for money under the terms of an insurance policy; 
a request for a sum of money that you believe you have a right to, especially from a company, the government, or others

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重在作出断言时表现出的坚定与不可动摇的态度。
多指无真凭实据, 不提供证据的断言或宣称。
主观意味强, 指自认为某事就是如此, 而不管事实如何。
可与 assert 换用, 但语气弱一些, 侧重指行为自己的权利提出要求他人承认。
maintain 与 assert 近义, 但前者指坚决维护某种主张或观点。
常指以道义原则为基础或以法律为依据的请求。
最普通用词, 指向对方提出要求或请求, 长、晚辈, 上下级之间都可使用。
指恳切地或再三地请求或要求, 常含低三下四意味, 也多用于应酬场合。
指有权或宣称有权得到而公开提出的要求。
一般指理直气壮地提出强烈要求, 或坚持不让对方拒绝的要求。
泛指一般"恳求或哀求", 含企图说服对方或用热烈的请求软化反对意见的意味。
书面用词, 着重指迫切、焦急或痛苦地恳求或哀求, 常含较强的感情色彩。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 宣称所有权; 要求; 认领

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: state or assert that something is the case; typically without providing evidence or proof

examination_example.sentence: Many studies <highlight>claim</highlight> that computers distract people, make them lazy thinkers and even lower their work efficiency.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多研究声称计算机会分散人们的注意力，使他们懒于思考，甚至降低他们的工作效率。

examination_example.sentence: Moreover, numerous studies <highlight>claim</highlight> that addiction to technology is real and it has the same effect on the brain as drug addiction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，许多研究声称对技术上瘾是真实存在的，它对大脑的影响与毒品成瘾相同。

examination_example.sentence: There have been concerns around the sugar content of cereal and the food industry's involvement in pro-breakfast research — and even one <highlight>claim</highlight> from an academic that breakfast is "dangerous".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们也一直担心谷物中的糖分含量，以及食品行业参与的支持早餐的研究，甚至有学者声称，早餐是“危险的”。

sense_info_list.en: assert right to; assert that one has gained or achieved something
sense_info_list.zh: 宣称所有权; 要求; 认领

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>claimed</highlight> damages for their heavy losses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们就重大损失要求损害赔偿。

examination_example.sentence: Three days later, the happy wife called to <highlight>claim</highlight> the ring.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 三天后，幸福的妻子打电话来认领戒指。

sense_info_list.en: a statement that something is true or is a fact; although other people might not believe it

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>claim</highlight> was based on a new review of studies about the effects of running.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一说法是基于一项新的关于跑步影响的研究综述。

examination_example.sentence: This was a <highlight>claim</highlight> made by The Times last week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是《泰晤士报》上周发表的声明。

sense_info_list.en: assert that one has gained or achieved something

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重在作出断言时表现出的坚定与不可动摇的态度。
多指无真凭实据，不提供证据的断言或宣称。
主观意味强，指自认为某事就是如此，而不管事实如何。
可与 assert 换用，但语气弱一些，侧重指行为自己的权利提出要求他人承认。
maintain 与 assert 近义，但前者指坚决维护某种主张或观点。
常指以道义原则为基础或以法律为依据的请求。
最普通用词，指向对方提出要求或请求，长、晚辈，上下级之间都可使用。
指恳切地或再三地请求或要求，常含低三下四意味，也多用于应酬场合。
指有权或宣称有权得到而公开提出的要求。
一般指理直气壮地提出强烈要求，或坚持不让对方拒绝的要求。
泛指一般"恳求或哀求"，含企图说服对方或用热烈的请求软化反对意见的意味。
书面用词，着重指迫切、焦急或痛苦地恳求或哀求，常含较强的感情色彩。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: Who is making the <highlight>claim</highlight> and why?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谁在提出主张，为什么？

examination_example.sentence: When you see or hear a <highlight>claim</highlight>, ask questions about it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看见或听到某种主张时，针对该主张提问。

examination_example.sentence: People use critical thinking to solve problems and evaluate <highlight>claims</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们使用批判性思维来解决问题和评估主张。
